name: pub
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
A2 a place, especially in Great Britain or Ireland, where alcoholic drinks can be bought and drunk and where food is often available: Do you want to go to (informal go down) the pub after work? our local pub a pub lunch. Compare
saloon
local noun (PUB) UKRelated word
publican UK
mustafagull/E+/GettyImages
More examplesFewer examplesa pub serving traditional British fareHe's one of the regulars at the Rose and Crown pub.
